00058             {

00138             function                selection_dialog( $FilePath , $EntityName , $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00139             {
00140                   try
00141                   {
00142                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( 
00143                                                                                           $ProcessingString , $EntityName.'_selection_dialog' ) ; )
00144                         {
00145                               $this->Settings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00146                               $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( $FilePath , $EntityName.'_selection_dialog.tpl' );
00147                               $OpenerId = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'opener_id' , false );
00148                               if( $OpenerId )
00149                               {
00150                                     $Template = str_replace( '{opener_selector}' , 'opener=#visible_{opener_id};' , $Template );
00151                                     $Template = str_replace( '{opener_id}' , $OpenerId , $Template );
00152                               }
00153                               $Template = str_replace( 
00154                                     '{id}' , $this->Settings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) ) , $Template
00155                               );
00156                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( 
00157                                     '{'.$EntityName."_selection_dialog:$MacroParameters}" , $Template , $ProcessingString
00158                               );
00159                               $Changed = true;
00160                         }
00161                         return( $ProcessingString );
00162                   }
00163                   catch( Exception $e )
00164                   {
00165                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00166                   }
00167             }
00168
